service.title: Database
service.desc: Laravel's Eloquent ORM provides best-in-class database abstraction without the headaches. Query and update your data without breaking a sweat. Eloquent pairs perfectly with MySQL, Postgres, SQLite, and SQL Server

largeCards.title: Forge
largeCards.desc: Server management doesn't have to be a nightmare. Provision and deploy unlimited PHP applications on DigitalOcean, Linode, Vultr, Amazon, Hetzner and more.

largeCards.title: Vapor
largeCards.desc: Laravel Vapor is a serverless deployment platform for Laravel, powered by AWS. Launch your Laravel infrastructure on Vapor and fall in love with the scalable simplicity of serverless.

smallCards.title: Breeze
smallCards.desc: Lightweight starter kit scaffolding for new applications with Blade or Inertia.

smallCards.title: Casher
smallCards.desc: Take the pain out of managing subscriptions on Stripe or Paddle.

smallCards.title: Dusk
smallCards.desc: Automated browser testing to ship your application with confidence.

smallCards.title: Echo
smallCards.desc: Listen for WebSocket events broadcast by your Laravel application.
